intent: Analyze monolith-to-microservices decision from multiple perspectives

success_criteria.primary: Reader understands key tradeoffs and can make informed decision
success_criteria.secondary: Analysis reflects the specific context (20-engineer startup)

must_cover_cons: Team size may be insufficient for proper microservices
context_awareness: 20 engineers is borderline small for microservices
Startup context: speed matters, over-engineering is risky

quality_rubric.balance: Neither blindly pro nor anti microservices
quality_rubric.context_sensitivity: Recommendation accounts for team size and startup stage
quality_rubric.actionability: Provides concrete next steps, not just abstract advice
